General.Name: Advance International Communication & Information Technology
General.Description: Advance International Communication and Information Technology Company provides technical and security solutions for government and private sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the Middle East. It offers crowd organization solution to collect and analyzes customer traffic data for malls, retail chains, museums, restaurants, and events; security inspection solutions; video surveillance systems; time attendance management solutions; vehicle access management systems; electronic locking solutions for hotels; and software platforms. The company is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Fahd Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
